about.short-story: I have wanted to make games when I was six years old. That's when I found out who made them. Then I told — "I'll be a programmer."
about.story-continue: When I turned 14 I became learning programming and I still do it. I am team leader and teach my employees how to write simple and supportable code. I like a lot functional programming. I wrote code in languages such as Elm, Haskell, and I made this site with ReScript. I like safe code, but also I like performance code — that's how I fell in love Rust. I have experience with a lot of programming languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, ReScript, Elm, Haskell, Rust, Python, C#, Java, C++, Pawn (it's dialect of C), Object Pascal, Perl. Just I like programming and evolving. I like science, digital drawing, UX, 3D, video making, and much more.

works.name: Wargaming (CООО Гейм Стрим)
works.description: Development in WoT Group. We develop UI of World of Tanks, site-portal of the game and another web-services. I responsible for my team, code quality and development processes. Also I help to write difficult systems and take part in the tech and architectural decisions.

works.name: Yzer Lab
works.description: It was internet chat like Telegram. There was translations on any languages by one click on icon near message. Calls appeared there earlier than in Telegram (with video). There was encryption from the beginning. I worked with all of this. We used a functionally reactive program system.

works.name: Покорми Зверя
works.description: It was internet shop by feed for animals by subscribe model. There was own MVC framework on base jQuery.

works.name: DigitalWand
works.description: Development and support sites by orders. It was outsource company. Also I charged of management an application one of client in Apple Store (testing, updating).

works.name: ArtLand
works.description: Development and support sites by orders. Development own task tracker and CRM system.

works.name: Покупатель 24
works.description: I was the only developer in Front-end. It was project work. I've done my part and we're done cooperating.

works.name: Filanko (hoster.ru)
works.description: Development of an admin panel for clients. There wasn't frameworks, only pure JS. I needed to leave for family reasons.

works.name: Отклик
works.description: Making HTML layout, fixing bugs, developing simple animations. Development of government and private orders. It was piecework.
